scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(server-api): updated changelog' && yarn version --major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(server-api): updated changelog' && yarn version --minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(server-api): updated changelog' && yarn version --patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
